ACCOUNT_CONFIRMATION: <%= login %>, you have subscribed on <%= title %>. This etherpad instance requires an email confirmation to activate your account. To proceed, thanks to go to this Web address : <%= url %>.
PASSRECOVER: <%= login %>, a password change request on <%= title %> has been initiated for your login. If you want to confirm your password change, please go to this Web address : <%= url %> . If this request does not come from you, simply ignore this email. Address will become invalid in <%= duration %> minutes.
